reporter_caption.center: HASSELL v. BOARD OF ELECTIONS, 458 Pa. 621 (1974)

caption.center: Hassell, Appellant, v. Board of Elections.

opinion.posture:
Appeal, No. 415, Jan. T., 1974, from order of Court of Common Pleas, Trial Division, of Philadelphia, March T., 1974, No. 4437, in case of Benjamin Hassell v. The County Board of Elections of Philadelphia County. Order affirmed.
Mandamus. Before RIBNER, J.
Decree filed dismissing plaintiff's complaint. Plaintiff appealed.
opinion.attorneys:
William F. Sullivan, Jr., for appellant.
Harry Wolov, for appellee.Page 622
opinion.panel: Before JONES, C. J., EAGEN, O'BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text:
Order affirmed.
Mr. Chief Justice JONES, Mr. Justice ROBERTS and Mr. Justice MANDERINO dissent.
